resources.string:
Hello! My name is Zaela
 
I guess it doesn't really matter what I put in here… 

I like cats, big and small. 
My favorite type of cat are Canadian Lynx. 
I like their big fluffy paws and the little tufts on their ears. 

I have a pet cat named Tiger. 
I named her when I was 11, so forgive the lack of creativity there. 
She's a brown tabby. 
She follows me everywhere but she doesn't like other people. 

Other people's cat also like me.
So do other people's dogs. 
But I had bad experiences with dogs when I was young so I don't like them very much… 

I think people that don't like cats are just expecting cats to act like dogs, but get upset when cats act like cats instead. 
They're fluffy friendly fur balls that happily vibrate and like to cuddle, it's hard not to like. 

Well that's probably enough text to demonstrate I can make a ScrollView work.
